templates.template: <button name="${function_name}" states="${state}" string="${string}" type="object" icon="${icon}"/>
<button name='%(${wizard_id})d' type='action' string='${string}' states='${state}' icon="${icon}"/>
<button name="${signal}" states="${state}" string="${string}" icon="${icon}"/>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.tree</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${string}"> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${string}"> <header> <field name="state" widget="statusbar"/> </header> <sheet> <group col="4" colspan="2" > <field name="name" /> </group> </sheet> <footer>
</footer> </form> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_search_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.search</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="${string}"> <field name="name"/> </search> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${MenuTitle}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${objectname}</field> <!-- <field name="domain">[('field_name','condition',criteria)]</field>--> <!-- <field name="context">{'flag':'value'}</field>--> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${object_name}_tree_view"/> <field name="search_view_id" ref="${object_name}_search_view"/> </record>
<menuitem id="${object_name}_menu" name="${MenuTitle}" sequence="${15}" parent="${cursor}" action="action_${object_name}_tree_view"/>
<filter name="filter_by_${state}" string="${Done}" domain="[('${state}','=','${done}')]" icon="gtk-ok"/>${cursor}

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${form_string}"> <header> <field name="state" widget="statusbar"/> </header> <sheet> <group col="4"> <field name="name"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"> <field name="${new_field}"/> </field> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_form_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.form</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${form_string}"> <notebook> <page string="${page_name}"> <field name="name" select="1"/> </page> </notebook> </form> </field> </record>
${objectname}.form ${objectname}
<group name="filter_by" string="${Filter}..."> <filter name="filter_by_${state}" string="${Done}" domain="[('${state}','=','${done}')]" icon="gtk-ok"/> ${cursor} </group>
<group name="group_by" string="${Group}..."> <filter name="group_by_${state}" string="${State}" context="{'group_by': '${state}'}" icon="gtk-ok"/> ${cursor} </group>
<filter name="group_by_${state}" string="${State}" context="{'group_by': '${state}'}" icon="gtk-ok"/>${cursor}
<menuitem id="${object_name}_menu" name="${MenuTitle}" sequence="${15}" parent="${cursor}" action="action_${object_name}_tree_view"/>
<menuitem id="${object_name}_menu" name="${MenuTitle}" sequence="${10}" />
<notebook colspan="4"> <page string="${Page_String}"> <field name="name" /> </page> </notebook>${cursor}

<openerp> <data>
</data> </openerp>

<record id="report_${report_name}_id" model="ir.actions.report.xml"> <field name="name">${ReportName}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.report.xml</field> <field name="model">${model_name}</field> <field name="report_name">${report_name}</field> <field name="report_type">aeroo</field> <field name="in_format">oo-${odt}</field> <field name='out_format' eval="ref('report_aeroo_ooo.report_mimetypes_${pdf}_${odt}')" /> <field name="report_rml">${module_name}/report/${report_file_name}.${odt}</field> <field name="parser_loc">${module_name}/report/${report_file_name}_parser.py</field> <field name="parser_state">loc</field> <field name="tml_source">file</field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_search_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.search</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="${search_string}"> <field name="name"/> </search> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_search_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.search</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"> <field name="${new_field}"/> </field> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.tree</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${tree_string}"> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${objectname}.tree</field> <field name="model">${objectname}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${view_name}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="${position}"> <field name="${new_field}"/> </field> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${objectname}</field> <!-- <field name="domain">[('field_name','condition',criteria)]</field>--> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${object_name}_tree_view"/> <field name="search_view_id" ref="${object_name}_search_view"/> </record>

<record id="action_${model_name}_tree_view_window" model="ir.actions.act_window.view"> <field eval="${1}" name="sequence"/> <field name="view_mode">${tree}</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${model_name}_${tree}_view"/> <field name="act_window_id" ref="action_${model_name}_tree_view"/> </record>

<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_${object_name}_tree_view"> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${objectname}</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${object_name}_form_view"/> <field name="target">new</field> </record>
<record id="wkf_${model_name}_id" model="workflow"> <field name="name">${Model_name} Workflow</field> <field name="osv">${modelname}</field> <field name="on_create">True</field> </record>

<record id="act_${statename}" model="workflow.activity"> <field name="wkf_id" ref="${wkf_id}"/> <!--<field name="flow_start">True</field>--> <!--<field name="flow_stop">True</field>--> <field name="name">${statename}</field> <field name="action">${function}</field> <field name="kind">function</field> </record>

<record id="${transition_id}" model="workflow.transition"> <field name="act_from" ref="${from_state}"/> <field name="act_to" ref="${to_state}"/> <field name="signal">${signal_name}</field> <!-- <field name="role_id" ref="${role_id}"/> --> <!-- <field name="condition">${condition_function}</field> --> </record>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="${encoding}"?>
